level.text: A filed record is effective only to the extent that it was filed by a person that may file it under § 28:9-509.
A record authorized by one secured party of record does not affect the financing statement with respect to another secured party of record.
A continuation statement that is not filed within the 6-month period prescribed by § 28:9-515(d) is ineffective.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in § 28:9-513 and § 28:9-515.
